div.h2: RAMS HEALTH CLINIC: THE DOCTOR IS IN
div.span: Today we opened the doors of our school-based health clinic! We are excited to be able to offer this service to our students and teachers and grateful for the partnership with CHI St. Vincen[...] . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.span: We are excited to announce that the Rams Health Clinic will open on Tuesday, March 3! . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.span: Thursday, Mr. Cook presented the LHS Girls Golf team with their State rings. This is the third year in a row that the LHS Girls Golf team has been State Champions. We are proud of the their [...] . . .

sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

ELECTRONIC FLYER DELIVERY STARTS 12/19/18
Lakeside School District is getting ready to launch a new electronic flyer communication tool called “Peachjar.” To view school-approved Digital flyers, . . .

div.span: Lakeside Middle School has taken Attendance Awareness Month to the next level with their RAMS are HERE and READY campaign. Each day that a teacher's homeroom has perfect attendance, they are awarded . . .

Lakeside School District

hr.p: LAKESIDE SCHOOL DISTRICT MISSION: Lakeside School District is committed to helping all students grow through learning by preparing them for an ever-changing world and by providing a learning environment which will facilitate the total development of each person.
